messages.text: I’m trying to understand my financial aid package. Can you help?
Absolutely! Are you trying to understand a specific part of your award, like grants, loans, or work-study?

Federal student loans are typically either subsidized or unsubsidized. A subsidized loan means the government pays the interest while you're in school, while an unsubsidized loan accrues interest from the moment it's disbursed. Your financial aid package will outline how much you’re eligible for. Do you need help figuring out how to accept or decline loans?

You can accept or decline loans via the UMD Financial Aid portal. Log in with your UMD credentials, and navigate to the 'Awards' section to see your offered loans. You can accept or decline them individually. Let me know if you need the link to the portal.
